entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow squalls. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow squalls and flurries at times heavy. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow squalls and flurries at times heavy changing to flurries this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
